data.text: @nzherald Stop the dramatic scare mongering!! Sadly, people die every day, always have, always will. Nothing to do with covid.

@nzherald It's a shame that transparency doesn't translate in causes of death.
Is that a human rights issue or a "freedom" of information issue?
@realrogerboyce @nzherald Come back to me when you've evolved to form rational arguments.
@nzherald It's very encouraging that there's vanishingly few deaths where omicron is causal. It means we'll get through this with few deaths. However NZ is still very tense and panicky.

@heathcliff_mr @jafalfc12 @nzherald Lol so what? The Economist put some numbers into a model and came up with some highly dubious numbers. The article you linked even admits there's plenty of skeptics. https://t.co/k1qjPc0t09
